title: Bigfoot Series 25 in. Poly Pusher Snow Shovel with Wooden Handle
description: The blade on this 25 in. Bigfoot pusher snow shovel features an extra wide radius, which allows the user to effortlessly roll snow off smooth surfaces such as decks and driveways - similar to a snow plow. Instead of having to stop shoveling due to snow piling up on the blade, you'll be able to effortlessly roll snow off of smooth surfaces in one motion - check out the product video and compare it to other snow pushers to see the difference.
